C

CSM_READER_NAME_REGEX - Static variable in interface org.eclipse.keyple.example.pc.calypso.PcscReadersSettings
 

D

Demo_HoplinkTransaction - Class in org.eclipse.keyple.example.pc.calypso
This Calypso demonstration code consists in: Setting up a two-reader configuration (@link main) and adding an observer method (@link update) Starting a card operation when a PO presence is notified (@link operatePoTransactions) Opening a logical channel with the CSM (C1 CSM is expected) (see @link CSM_C1_ATR_REGEX) Attempting to open a logical channel with the PO with 3 options: Selection with a fake AID Selection with a Navigo AID Selection with a Hoplink AID Display SeRequest/SeResponse data (@link printSelectAppResponseStatus) If the Hoplink selection succeeded, do 3 Hoplink transactions (@link operateMultipleHoplinkTransactions).
Demo_HoplinkTransaction() - Constructor for class org.eclipse.keyple.example.pc.calypso.Demo_HoplinkTransaction
